org.apache.spark.mllib.evaluation

类 RegressionMetrics

  • Object
    • org.apache.spark.mllib.evaluation.RegressionMetrics
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Logging

    public class RegressionMetrics
extends Object
implements Logging
    Evaluator for regression.

    param: predictionAndObservations an RDD of (prediction, observation) pairs param: throughOrigin True if the regression is through the origin. For example, in linear regression, it will be true without fitting intercept.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      RegressionMetrics(RDD<scala.Tuple2<Object,Object>> predictionAndObservations) 
      RegressionMetrics(RDD<scala.Tuple2<Object,Object>> predictionAndObservations, boolean throughOrigin) 

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      double explainedVariance()
      Returns the variance explained by regression.
      double meanAbsoluteError()
      Returns the mean absolute error, which is a risk function corresponding to the expected value of the absolute error loss or l1-norm loss.
      double meanSquaredError()
      Returns the mean squared error, which is a risk function corresponding to the expected value of the squared error loss or quadratic loss.
      double r2()
      Returns R^2^, the unadjusted coefficient of determination.
      double rootMeanSquaredError()
      Returns the root mean squared error, which is defined as the square root of the mean squared error.

    • 方法详细资料

      • explainedVariance

        public double explainedVariance()
        Returns the variance explained by regression. explainedVariance = $\sum_i (\hat{y_i} - \bar{y})^2^ / n$
        返回:
        (undocumented)
        另请参阅:
        Fraction of variance unexplained (Wikipedia)

      • meanAbsoluteError

        public double meanAbsoluteError()
        Returns the mean absolute error, which is a risk function corresponding to the expected value of the absolute error loss or l1-norm loss.
        返回:
        (undocumented)

      • meanSquaredError

        public double meanSquaredError()
        Returns the mean squared error, which is a risk function corresponding to the expected value of the squared error loss or quadratic loss.
        返回:
        (undocumented)

      • rootMeanSquaredError

        public double rootMeanSquaredError()
        Returns the root mean squared error, which is defined as the square root of the mean squared error.
        返回:
        (undocumented)

      • r2

        public double r2()
        Returns R^2^, the unadjusted coefficient of determination.
        返回:
        (undocumented)
        另请参阅:
        Coefficient of determination (Wikipedia) In case of regression through the origin, the definition of R^2^ is to be modified., J. G. Eisenhauer, Regression through the Origin. Teaching Statistics 25, 76-80 (2003)
